title: Between Ferguson's Police And Population, A Racial Divide
teaser: Robert Siegel speaks with local political leader Patricia Bynes of Ferguson, Mo., about the clashes between residents and police taking place there since the weekend. Unrest erupted after an unarmed black teenager was shot and killed by police recently in the St. Louis suburb.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
